trends: There have been no other sightings in Maastricht
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Star like objects, first solo star like, then 2 more join the one hovering.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis evening while closing the door of my balkony back of the house! One lite point moving quite fast from the South (belgium, the City Of liege!!!) Toward the north city of maastricht! stops above the house at quite high altitude!, full stop, while i keep track of it, 2 more lite's coming from the North meet up with the one that stoped, they join it in a matter that sudenly describes a Triangle!!!! they dont move at all, for 2-3 mins, then! From them position move all back together toward Belgium (South) from the dutch Town of Maastricht ! Ham Radio Qth-Locator +- (JO20US) check out on Ham Radio World map! Amazing....3 min's that did not seem to pass.... My heart is stil beating like hell....nice show thoug.... :)
